title: The Man from Pluto
description: After Pluto is destroyed in a nuclear test, its last son comes to Earth, hungry for vengence.
quote: And now I have no choice but to kill him. Him, who never meant us guys no harm at all.
altHero: Man from Pluto, abald man in a space suit with a light bulb sticking out the front
alt1: Man from Pluto walking through a park
alt2: an army general speaks with a soldier
alt4: a fedora hat hanging from a string in front of the Capitol
